page.title: 14Leisure continued.
page.content: Although many of the clubs already mentioned have visitors from outside of Brightlingsea, the involvement of people from outside the community in the water based leisure activities is of a different nature. During the warmer months there is an influx of enthusiasts wishing to avail themselves of the relatively safe waters that surround us. Generally speaking Motorboating enthusiasts tend to operate as individuals, mainly using their craft for fishing. Sailors in the main make use of either the Yacht Club or the Sailing Club for support in their cruising racing or board sailing these two clubs have between them been responsible for the spawning of many National, European and World Champions as well as an Olympic Gold Medalist.
